container.title: Color PH Index
container.mission_statement: This wiki is intended for the purpose of indexing color alkalinity and acidity in a parsable format for using in adventure games under a GPL license for educational purposes.

color.color_alkalinity: This color has the second highest level of acidity in the color acidity spectrum for colors related to Salmon Red.
color.color_relationship: This color is derived from Salmon red and Browny Orange.
